title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a simple CLI and Docker support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models, installable via pip as ‘langchain-ollama’.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with Docker compose setup.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli-csharp
summary: .NET global tool that wraps Ollama for C# developers, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for using Ollama models in deepset pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for common Ollama use-cases (RAG, fine-tuning, etc.).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose templates for CPU & GPU setups.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React-based chat UI for Ollama, installable via npm.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama using Bolt framework.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI assistant pane powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node for calling Ollama models inside workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-express-starter
summary: Boilerplate Express server exposing REST endpoints for Ollama chat & embed.
